Support & FAQ

Get help and answers to frequently asked questions about MEMS D-AMP

Frequently Asked Questions

You can contribute by emailing your course review to damp.mems@iitb.ac.in. Include details about difficulty, professors, textbooks, and your personal experience. Our team will review and publish it on the blog.

You can reach out to our mentors listed on the team page, or attend our resume sessions and internship workshops. We also have detailed internship experiences shared by seniors on our experiences page.

DS minor requires a minimum CPI of 8.0 and completion of specific courses like CS 101, MA 106, and DS 101. Check our course tracks page for detailed requirements and course combinations.

We recruit new team members at the beginning of each semester. Keep an eye on our announcements for recruitment drives. You can also reach out to current team members to express your interest.

We organize resume building sessions, SOPHIE 101 workshops, dual degree information sessions, internship preparation workshops, and various academic guidance events. Check our events page for upcoming activities.

You can report technical issues or content errors by emailing damp.mems@iitb.ac.in with the subject line "Website Issue". Include screenshots and detailed description of the problem.
